message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $100. This is a fair price considering its value to you.
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I have to be mindful of my budget.
I understand your concerns about budget, Bob, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $95. This is a fair compromise considering its value to you.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice, but I was thinking more along the lines of $85. I'm really interested in the product, but I'm trying to stay within my budget.
I'm willing to make one more compromise, Bob. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $92. This is as low as I'm willing to go, but I think it's still a fair price considering its value to you.
I appreciate your willingness to make one more compromise, Alice, but I was thinking more along the lines of $87. I'm really interested in the product, and I'm hoping we can meet in the middle.
I'm not willing to go any lower, Bob. I've already compromised a lot, and I think $87 is still a bit too low. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $90, but that's my final offer.
